pageContext.claim: “So if you read my speech -- and many people have done it, and I've seen it both in the papers and in the media, on television -- it's been analyzed, and people thought that what I said was totally appropriate....they've analyzed my speech and words and my final paragraph, my final sentence, and everybody, to the T, thought it was totally appropriate.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's Jan. 6 speech was almost universally condemned in television and news reports as being the trigger for the Capitol riot. Trump was also criticized for not seeking to immediately call for an end to the violence, and then only doing so in a half-hearted manner.
